price: 15. Kaadu nummah Yalli xiibiteh Nabii Nuuc kee kay marih maaqentat Yallih dudda tascassee astay kas elle geyaanah tet cabneemil nuucul ciggiila marah. Tohul kassita maray qakkaloowah iyya maay yan?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
